# FCI composites (MTG-I)

Predefined composites of wavelengths for cloud, dust, ash and atmospheric analysis.

```{python eval=FALSE, include=TRUE}
from satpy import Scene
scn = Scene(filenames=files, reader='fci_l1c_nc')
print(scn.available_composite_names())
```

{\tiny
24h_microphysics, airmass, ash, cimss_cloud_type, cloud_phase, convection, dust, natural_color, true_color, volcanic_emissions, ...
}

# LI Lightning Imager (MTG-I) — Groups

\small

| Variable           | Description                 |
| ------------------ | --------------------------- |
| `group_time`       | UTC time of the group       |
| `latitude`         | Radiance-weighted latitude  |
| `longitude`        | Radiance-weighted longitude |
| `radiance`         | Total radiance              |
| `number_of_events` | Number of events            |
| `flash_id`         | Associated flash ID         |
| `group_filter_qa`  | Quality indicator           |

{\footnotesize Product: LI-2-LGR-x-FD-x}

# LI Lightning Imager (MTG-I) — Flashes

\small

| Variable                  | Description                 |
| ------------------------- | --------------------------- |
| `flash_time`              | Time of first group         |
| `flash_duration`          | Flash duration              |
| `latitude`                | Radiance-weighted latitude  |
| `longitude`               | Radiance-weighted longitude |
| `radiance`                | Total flash radiance        |
| `number_of_groups`        | Number of groups            |
| `flash_footprint`         | Flash size in pixels        |
| `flash_filter_confidence` | Confidence indicator        |

# InfraRed Sounder IRS (MTG-S)

**Hyperspectral infrared sounder**

* 3D temperature and humidity structure
* Water vapour transport
* CO and ozone monitoring
* ~2 km vertical resolution

**Specifications:**

* Spatial resolution: 4 km at nadir
* Temporal: 15–30 min regional
* 60 min full disk

# IRS Spectral Bands

| Band | Wavenumber Range | Channels | Main Targets |
| ---- | ---------------- | -------- | ------------ |
| LWIR | 679.5–1210 cm⁻¹  | 887      | H₂O, CO₂, O₃ |
| MWIR | 1600–2250 cm⁻¹   | 1076     | H₂O, CO      |

# Sentinel-4 / UVN (MTG-S)

Objective: Monitor the diurnal cycle of atmospheric composition over Europe.

* O₃
* NO₂
* SO₂
* HCHO
* CHOCHO

**Spatial resolution:** 8 × 8 km²
**Revisit time:** ~60 min
